Welcome to BuddyBeat! This app moves with you, adjusting the speed of your music to match your workout intensity. This short tutorial will guide you through the basic features.

BPM represents the tempo of the song. Higher BPM means a faster song, and lower BPM means a slower one. You can adjust the BPM to match the pace of your workout, or it will be done automatically for you.
Use the \'+\' button to increase the BPM of the current song. Use the \'-\' button to decrease the BPM. These adjustments allow you to match the tempo of the song with your workout intensity.
Toggle between Manual and Auto modes. In Manual mode, you control the BPM with the \'+\' and \'-\' buttons. In Auto mode, the app adjusts the BPM automatically based on your activity.
